meanings.definition: A person or thing that shreds.
meanings.sent1: The office manager hired two efficient shredders to help with document disposal.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy a new shredder for my home office to destroy old bills.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous raccoon in the backyard is a real shredder, always tearing up the trash bags.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like emotional shredders, cutting through his defenses effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The shredder at the recycling plant roared to life, devouring stacks of paper in seconds.

meanings.definition: A machine or device used for shredding paper or other materials.
meanings.sent1: The company invested in high-quality shredders to protect sensitive information.
meanings.sent2: Please make sure to empty the shredder after it's full to avoid jams.
meanings.sent3: The paper shredder at the office party was a hit, turning unwanted documents into confetti.
meanings.sent4: The shredder hummed like a contented cat as it shredded through the pile of old newspapers.
meanings.sent5: The shredder's blades gleamed in the sunlight, ready to turn any paper into strips.
